content: {"name": "Philadelphia Corporation for Aging (PCA)", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.pcacares.org/request-assistance/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 765-9040", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "If you are eligible for other PCA services, you may qualify for home delivered meals. Age requirements differ for each program but usually it\u2019s 60+. Frozen meals, or hot meals if unable to heat meals yourself, are delivered for every day of the week. The assessment worker who conducts your care assessment will determine if you are eligible. You can call or submit a request assistance form online. "}]}
